summary:
Lamb of God is an American heavy metal band from Richmond, Virginia, formed in 1994. The band members are John Campbell, Randy Blythe, Mark Morton, Willie Adler, and Art Cruz. They are known for their intense music and are part of the new wave of American heavy metal.

The band has released many albums, including *Omens* (2022), and has sold almost two million records in the U.S. They have been nominated for Grammy Awards and have toured with big names like Metallica and Slayer. Lamb of God has also performed at famous festivals like Ozzfest, Download Festival, and Mayhem Festival.
title: Lamb of God (band)
